publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2746 Janis Hughes:International Nurses Day—That the Parliament notes that 12 May 2005 is International Nurses Day; celebrates the contribution made by nurses and other NHS staff; acknowledges that each day over 100,000 people in Scotland use NHS services, which are increasingly provided by nurses; notes with concern that nurses and their colleagues are frustrated with the often negative reporting of the work they do, and praises NHS staff for their efforts on our behalf.
S2M-2746 International Nurses’ Day (lodged on 29 April 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Michael McMahon*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-2746 International Nurses’ Day (lodged on 29 April 2005) Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bill Butler*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Christine May*, Mike Watson*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Bristow Muldoon*, Nora Radcliffe*, Shiona Baird*, Cathie Craigie*, Scott Barrie*, Mike Pringle*, Karen Whitefield*, Fiona Hyslop*, Cathy Peattie*, Tricia Marwick*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Sarah Boyack*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2746 International Nurses’ Day (lodged on 29 April 2005) Patrick Harvie* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S2M-2746 International Nurses’ Day (lodged on 29 April 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Chris Ballance*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2746 International Nurses’ Day (lodged on 29 April 2005) Karen Gillon*, Susan Deacon*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-2746 International Nurses’ Day (lodged on 29 April 2005) Roseanna Cunningham*, John Swinburne*, Mr David Davidson*
